page.title: 16HOUSING, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: The Crown Inn, Haselor was sold about three years ago and Haselor no longer had its own pub. The buildings have almost been converted into 4 luxury homes. There were going to be 5 but they have only done 4 so far. They are quite expensive houses. Morris Cottage is quite a contrast to the new homes that are built on the Crown. It is a very old house that is situated between two others and no way of getting to the back unless you go through the house.The walls are made of wattle and daub, the windows are small squares of glass.It is up for sale. Hazel Cot,opposite the school,has had some stables built in its grounds and a garage built.
